titleStmt.title: The Odes, Satyrs, and Epistles of Horace Done into English.
Selections. English. 1688.
titleStmt.author: Horace.
Creech, Thomas, 1659-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Jacob Tonson, and sold by Tim. Goodwin at the Maiden-head against St. Dunstans Church in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: "To the very much esteemed John Dryden, Esq." signed by the translator, Thomas Creech.
With two final advertisment leaves (for Jacob Tonson) at end.
A variant has an engraving of two figures and a winged child on the verso of A, and pagination: [14], 183, [1], 369-432, 449-570 p.; the text is the same.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Maiden-head against St. Dunstans Church in Fleetstreet
